topic.title: Join a Meeting as a Guest User

body.p: As a Guest user, you can join a meeting directly through the meeting invite received from the meeting host in Outlook or through a link shared via e-mail or chat.
To join a meeting as a Guest user, use the following procedure:

li.p: Click the meeting invite link you received. The MiTeam Meetings web application is launched, and the Welcome page opens.
You must enter your name and email address, and specify the audio and video setting in the Welcome page and click Enter waiting room.
li.note: You can preview the video, find the dial-in numbers and the meeting ID, and download the MiTeam Meetings desktop application from the Welcome page.

To resolve issues you face while enabling microphone, speaker, or camera, see the FAQ How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings desktop application in Windows and Mac OS? or How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings web application in a browser?.

li.p: You must wait until any registered user who has already joined the meeting accepts you as a Guest user in the meeting. Click Report Problem to report any issues you face while joining the meeting.
After a registered user accepts you, click Enter now to join the meeting.
